title: Vivek Murthy
description: Vivek Murthy, Surgeon General of the United States, answers three questions about the mysterious and often huge fish, the sturgeon. Also featured are interviews with Jeremy Allen White and Mandy Moore.

itunes:summary: Vivek Murthy, Surgeon General of the United States, joins us, along with Jeremy Allen White, Mandy Moore, and a few of our panelists.

content:encoded: Vivek Murthy, Surgeon General of the United States, answers three questions about the mysterious and often huge fish, the sturgeon. Also featured are interviews with Jeremy Allen White and Mandy Moore.
